meanings.definition: A long, orange vegetable that grows underground.
meanings.sent1: I planted a carrot in the garden.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed eating a crunchy carrot.
meanings.sent3: The rabbit danced happily after finding a carrot.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a freshly-picked carrot.
meanings.sent5: The carrot's vibrant color stood out in the vegetable patch.

meanings.definition: A reward or incentive offered to encourage a desired behavior.
meanings.sent1: He was excited to receive a carrot for his good work.
meanings.sent2: The team was motivated by the promise of a carrot.
meanings.sent3: The carrot dangling in front of him kept him focused.
meanings.sent4: The carrot of success was within reach for the hardworking student.
meanings.sent5: The carrot of achievement spurred her to keep going.
